Staff List

All music Arranged/Play Guitars/Programings/Lyrics Written/Mixing by mcn

Vocal Recording (Tr.1,2,5,7,8) and Mastering Engineered by Seki at Chaoscillation Studio
Vocal Recording Engineered (Tr.3,4,5,6) by mcn at Studio101
Illustrations and Jacket Designs by miya9

Photography by 神谷アルテ 
Produced by J&B
